song_lyrics: Panch vār faryā santne harāvyā... ḍolariyo 1
jāgyā sānje sabhā karī bahu sārī;
Dhanya dhanya be āmbā aghhārī... ḍolariyo 2
tyā to shobhe urvī ghaṇī re vishāḷ;
Āvyā sangh ghaṇā ghaṇā sāyamkāḷ... ḍolariyo 3
Premānand kahe bangle gayā Bhagwān... ḍolariyo 4
title: Ḍolariyo jamvā ūṭhyā rangrel

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-752: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
